\subsubsection[{is\+\_\+tool}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}def excerpts.\+op.\+is\+\_\+tool (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{}]{name}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{namespaceexcerpts_1_1op_a1dbd8794ebc46a0677b75330f4c98d51}


Test if a Program is Installed. 

Will raise an error if the program is not found.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em name} & The name of the program to be tested for. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
True if the Program is installed. 
\end{DoxyReturn}

Run Pandoc on a File. 


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em file\+\_\+name} & The file on which to run pandoc. \\
\hline
{\em formats} & The pandoc output formats to be used. A comma separated string (\char`\"{}html,tex\char`\"{} for example) a tuple or a list giving the formats. \\
\hline
{\em compile\+\_\+latex} & Compile the La\+Te\+X file? \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
